sense.name: cut small bits from (the edge) to make smaller
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] PARE NP2[patient[concrete]] Includes: PARE DOWN NOTE: A cutting implement is ALWAYS implied.
sense.examples: 'Winston, please pare the hedges.' I need to pare my fingernails, they're getting too long. Pare down the pumpkin for the stew.

sense.name: decrease in size; lessen
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] PARE NP2[patient[abstract]] Includes: PARE DOWN
sense.examples: The company has pared its high-yield bond holdings from 890 million dollars to about 500 million. Sherwood chair Ron Sherwood says the group pared down its members who were unable to attend regular meetings.
